duck: Helton, North Carolina, an unincorporated community in Helton Township - Helton is an unincorporated community in Helton Township, Ashe County, North Carolina, east of Sturgills.

Helton, Kentucky - Helton is an unincorporated community in Leslie County, Kentucky, United States.Its post office is closed.
Helton is an English surname from the village of Elton, Cheshire, England.

wiki.text:
'[[Helton (name)|Helton]]' is an English surname from the village of Elton,
Cheshire, England.

'Helton' may also refer to:
* Helton, Cumbria, a village in England
* Helton, Kentucky
* Helton Township, Ashe County, North Carolina, USA ** Helton, North Carolina,
  an unincorporated community in Helton Township
* Helton da Silva Arruda, a Brazilian football goalkeeper
wiki.title: helton
